articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: 1st Test: Nathan Lyon shines as Australia thrash New Zealand by 172 runs - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Australia's spinner Nathan Lyon took six wickets for 65 runs as they dismissed New Zealand for 196 in the second innings to register a thumping 172-run victory on the fourth day of the first Test at Wellington's Basin Reserve.
articles.content: Dhoni, Sachin, Bravo dazzle at Anant Ambani's 'Mela Rouge'
